summary: Five ambitious cousins set out on a family reunion during the dead of winter. The purpose of the retreat is to secure their inheritance, a fortune that dates back many generations.
cast: Rochelle Aytes|Golden Brooks|Janae Burney|Keith David|Andr√© De Shields|Demetrius Grosse|Darrin Dewitt Henson|Shawn Michael Howard|Lanre Idewu|Chene Lawson|Adriane Lenox|Johntae Lipscomb|Chaz Monet|Edward Nattenberg|Novella Nelson|Jenny Weaver|D.B. Woodside
title: The Inheritance
